text: @realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends @CNN Why are you choosing this stuff to worry about?  Ratings?Russia is putting bounties on our troops. Our protectors!Thousands of Americans have died from Coronavirus and it continues to spread in our country due to your poor leadership but TV ratings is what you are care about. Omg
